data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: A Local Area Network (LAN) is a number of computer and peripherals connected over a small geographical distance, covering one building or site. Most ____ are ____ up ____ one ____ more ____ and ____. A ____ is a high ____ computer ____ sufficient ____ power ____ storage ____ to ____ a ____ of ____. A client is any computer attached to the network.
data.partBlankContent: A Local Area Network (LAN) is a number of computer and peripherals connected over a small geographical distance, covering one building or site. Most LA__ are ma__ up o_ one o_ more ser____ and cli____. A ser___ is a high specif_______ computer wi__ sufficient proce_____ power a__ storage capa____ to ser____ a num___ of us___. A client is any computer attached to the network.
data.answer: 局域网(LAN)是在一个小的地理距离上连接的计算机和外设，覆盖一个建筑物或站点。大多数局域网由一个或多个服务器和客户端组成。服务器是一种高规格的计算机，具有足够的处理能力和存储容量，可以为多个用户提供服务。客户端是任何连接到网络的计算机。
